statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (2,-9) and (12,-2).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{2}-{\left(-{9}\right)}}}{{{12}-{\left({2}\right)}}}=\frac{{7}}{{10}} which reduces to \displaystyle\frac{{7}}{{10}} (if it's not already reduced)
